Chokehold.card_desc: [Commander's Grab] Heal for {scale=100|100} after activating Commander's Grab.

Close and Personal.card_desc: [Commander's Grab] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after hitting an enemy with Commander's Grab.

Hold the Line!.card_desc: [Battle Shout] Heal for an additional {scale=80|80} after activating Battle Shout.

Hopeguard.card_desc: [Bulwark] Increase your Healing received by {scale=6|6}% while your Bulwark is active.

Hulking Strength.card_desc: [Commander's Grab] Reduce the Cooldown of Commander's Grab by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Into the Breach!.card_desc: [Battle Shout] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 3s after activating Battle Shout.

Lian's Shield.card_desc: [Bulwark] Your Shield regenerates at 100% effectiveness even while it is active.

Lifetaker.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=8|8}% after getting an Elimination.

Martial Law.card_desc: [Commander's Grab] Generate {scale=5|5} Ammo after activating Commander's Grab.

Never Surrender!.card_desc: [Battle Shout] Reduce the Cooldown of Battle Shout by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Open Fire!.card_desc: [Battle Shout] Generate {scale=4|4} Ammo after activating Battle Shout.

Ready for War.card_desc: [Bulwark] Increase the recharge rate of your Bulwark by {scale=6|6}%.

Shield Wall.card_desc: [Bulwark] Increase the Health of your Bulwark by {scale=200|200}.

Storm of Bullets.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your Attack Speed by 40%, but reduce your damage-per-shot by 25%.

Vigorous Defense.card_desc: [Bulwark] Heal for {scale=25|25} every 1s while Bulwark is active.

Vortex Grip.card_desc: [Commander's Grab] Targets hit by Commander's Grab are Stunned for an additional 2s.

Feuer frei!.card_desc: [Kampfschrei] Nach Aktivierung von Kampfschrei wird {scale=4|4} Munition erzeugt.

Halte die Stellung.card_desc: [Kampfschrei] Nach Aktivierung von Kampfschrei wirst du zusätzlich {scale=80|80} LP geheilt.

Hoffnungstr\u00e4ger.card_desc: [Bollwerk] Während Bollwerk aktiv ist, erhältst du um {scale=6|6}% erhöhte Heilung.

In die Bresche.card_desc: [Kampfschrei] Nach Aktivierung von Kampfschrei erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

K\u00f6rperkontakt.card_desc: [Kommandeursgriff] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Kommandeursgriff, wird erlittener Schaden 2s lang um {scale=8|8}% reduziert.

Kriegsrecht.card_desc: [Kommandeursgriff] Nach Aktivierung von Kommandeursgriff wird {scale=5|5} Munition erzeugt.

Kriegsvorbereitung.card_desc: [Bollwerk] Die Aufladerate deines Bollwerks erhöht sich um {scale=6|6}%.

Kugelhagel.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht dein Angriffstempo um 40%, reduziert aber deinen Schaden pro Schuss um 25%.

Lebensdieb.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=8|8}%.

Lians Schild.card_desc: [Bollwerk] Selbst während er aktiv ist, lädt dein Schild mit 100% Effektivität auf.

Massive St\u00e4rke.card_desc: [Kommandeursgriff] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Kommandeursgriff um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Niemals Aufgeben.card_desc: [Kampfschrei] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Kampfschrei um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

R\u00fcstung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Starke Verteidigung.card_desc: [Bollwerk] Während Bollwerk aktiv ist, wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=25|25} LP geheilt.

Vortexgriff.card_desc: [Kommandeursgriff] Von Kommandeursgriff getroffene Gegner werden zusätzliche 2s lang betäubt.

W\u00fcrgegriff.card_desc: [Kommandeursgriff] Nach Aktivierung von Kommandeursgriff wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Battre en br\u00e8che.card_desc: [Cri de guerre] Cri de guerre augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 3s.

Bouclier de Lian.card_desc: [Rempart] Le Rempart se recharge à vitesse normale même pendant son utilisation.

Bourreau.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=8|8}%.

D\u00e9luge de balles.card_desc: [Arme] Votre cadence de tir augmente de 40% mais vos tirs infligent 25% de dégâts en moins.

Emprise du vortex.card_desc: [Prise du commandant] Prise du commandant étourdit la cible 2s de plus.

En toute intimit\u00e9.card_desc: [Prise du commandant] Vous subissez {scale=8|8}% de dégâts en moins pendant 2s après avoir touché un ennemi avec Prise du commandant.

Feu \u00e0 volont\u00e9.card_desc: [Cri de guerre] Cri de guerre vous rend {scale=4|4} munitions.

Force brute.card_desc: [Prise du commandant] Prise du commandant se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Garant de l'espoir.card_desc: [Rempart] Vous recevez {scale=6|6}% de soins en plus quand le Rempart est actif.

Jusqu'au bout.card_desc: [Cri de guerre] Cri de guerre se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Ligne de front.card_desc: [Cri de guerre] Cri de guerre vous rend {scale=80|80} PV de plus.

Loi martiale.card_desc: [Prise du commandant] Prise du commandant vous rend {scale=5|5} munitions.

Main ferme.card_desc: [Prise du commandant] Prise du commandant vous rend {scale=100|100} PV.

Mur de boucliers.card_desc: [Rempart] Le Rempart a {scale=200|200} PV en plus.

Pr\u00e9parations martiales.card_desc: [Rempart] La vitesse de rechargement du Rempart augmente de {scale=6|6}%.

Robustesse.card_desc: [Rempart] Vous regagnez {scale=25|25} PV/s quand le Rempart est actif.

Soif de sang.card_desc: [Armure] Vous obtenez {scale=4|4}% de drain de vie.

\u518d\u751f.card_desc: 当你使用绝对防御时，每秒回复 {scale=25|25} 点生命值.

\u7687\u5ba4\u62a4\u536b.card_desc: 壁垒激活期间也能以60%的速率恢复生命值

\u7834\u9635\uff01.card_desc: 使用战吼的3秒内，移动速度增加{scale=8|8}%

Muro de escudos.card_desc: [Baluarte] La salud de Baluarte aumenta en {scale=200|200} PS.

Tormenta de balas.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de ataque aumenta un 40%, pero se reduce el daño infligido por disparo un 25%.

Parede de Escudo.card_desc: [Barreira] Aumenta a vida da sua Barreira em {scale=200|200}.

Pronto para a Guerra.card_desc: [Barreira] A Barreira se recarrega {scale=6|6}% mais rápido.

Pr\u00f3ximo e Pessoal.card_desc: [Constrição do Comandante] Reduz em {scale=8|8}% o dano recebido por 2s após atingir um inimigo com a Constrição do Comandante.

V\u00f3rtex Paralisante.card_desc: [Constrição do Comandante] Alvos da Constrição do Comandante permanecem atordoadas por mais 2s.

\u0411\u043b\u0438\u0437\u043a\u043e \u0.card_desc: [Командирский захват] При попадании по врагу Командирским захватом вы получаете на {scale=8|8}% меньше урона в течение 2 с.

\u0413\u0440\u0430\u0434 \u043f\u0443\u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваша скорость атаки повышается на 40%, но урон за выстрел снижается на 25%.

\u0414\u0435\u0440\u0436\u0430\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Боевой клич] Активация Боевого клича исцеляет вас еще на {scale=80|80} ед.

\u0417\u0430\u0431\u0438\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=8|8}%.

\u0417\u0430\u0449\u0438\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Бастион] Пока действует Бастион, вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% больше исцеления.

\u041c\u043e\u0449\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Бастион] Пока действует Бастион, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=25|25} ед. в секунду.

\u041d\u0430\u043f\u0440\u043e\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Боевой клич] Активация Боевого клича повышает скорость передвижения на {scale=8|8}% на 3 с.

\u041d\u0438\u043a\u043e\u0433\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Боевой клич] Перезарядка Боевого клича сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u041e\u0433\u043e\u043d\u044c!.card_desc: [Боевой клич] Активация Боевого клича генерирует {scale=4|4} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041f\u043b\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u0423\u0434\u0443\u0448\u0430\u044e\u04.card_desc: [Командирский захват] Активация Командирского захвата исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.
